name.en: Eldlixir of the Exalted Golden Land
name.ja: <ruby>貴<rt>とうと</rt></ruby>き<ruby>黄<rt>おう</rt></ruby><ruby>金<rt>ごん</rt></ruby><ruby>郷<rt>きょう</rt></ruby>のエルドリクシル

text.en:
You can pay 800 LP, then activate 1 of these effects;
● Special Summon this card as a Normal Monster (Zombie/LIGHT/Level 10/ATK 1500/DEF 2800) (this card is also still a Trap), then, if you control "Eldlich the Golden Lord", you can return 1 monster on the field to the hand.
● Set 1 of your banished "Golden Land" or "Eldlixir" Spells/Traps.
You can only use this effect of "Eldlixir of the Exalted Golden Land" once per turn.
